subject: CHARLES PLUMBER SOLICITORS
body:
CHARLES PLUMBER SOLICITORS UKÂ®

wishpersman@gmail.com
 
Attention of : 
Dear Madam,
Your statements seem ambiguous because your actions and characters might have indicated.
With due respect you are the only beneficiary who has been advised concerning the facilitator and no one else so how did it leak?.
I won't write much other than advise you to always maintain secrecy and avoid  the public. If you are in doubt you should have contacted him first and inquired from him and not through a third party unethical and unacceptable.
For now your slot remains  suspended for failure to adhere to information given earlier probably after further investigation you might be contacted.
Have a nice day.
 
Yours Sincerely, 
CHARLES PLUMBER, ESQ
Email: 
wishpersman@gmail.com
Telephone number: +44-7700000-713

subject: Re:    CHARLES PLUMBER SOLICITORS
body:
Hello Charles Plumber, ESQ,

Thank you for your message. I must admit, I'm a bit confused by some of the details. Could you please clarify what you mean by my slot being suspended? And what was the advice given earlier that I apparently failed to adhere to?

I assure you, I have no intention of sharing any sensitive information publicly. My aim is simply to understand the situation better.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Donna
